mapper.select: SELECT cast(study_id as char) as STUDY_ID , cast(study_day as char) as STUDY_DAY , CONTENTS , cast(log_date as char) as LOG_DATE FROM study_log
SELECT cast(study_id as char) as STUDY_ID , cast(study_day as char) as STUDY_DAY , CONTENTS , cast(log_date as char) as LOG_DATE FROM study_log
